metadata.title: CVE-2024-49968 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ext4: filesystems without casefold feature cannot be mounted with siphashWhen mounting the ext4 filesystem, if the default hash version is set toDX_HASH_SIPHASH but the casefold feature is not set, exit the mounting.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
